io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Container, Label, Layer, Picture, ProgressBar, ScrollBar, Slider, TextComponent

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a GUI component.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468
